#summary Where to start when creating Coderush/Refactor/DXCore plugins

== I'd like to write a plugin ==

So you'd like to make some cool plugins like the ones here.
This is intended to be a list of resources for that very task.

This is a process best learned by example. 

So take a look around... 

 * ...Follow some tutorials ...
 * ...[http://code.google.com/p/dxcorecommunityplugins/ Download some examples] 
 * ...[http://code.google.com/p/dxcorecommunityplugins/source/list Download their source]
 * ...and ask some questions... 

The best place to ask any questions is in the [http://community.devexpress.com/forums/181.aspx "DXCore plugins" forum hosted by DevExpress]
